abstract: Prime Minister Vladimir Putin urged Russia’s state-controlled banks to boost lending to major industries and advised their heads not to take their summer vacations until this was done.
snippet: Prime Minister Vladimir Putin urged Russia’s state-controlled banks to boost lending to major industries and advised their heads not to take their summer vacations until this was done.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin on Monday urged Russia’s state-controlled banks to boost lending to major industries and advised their heads not to take their summer vacations until this was done, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: Putin to Bankers: No Vacation Until Loans Are Made
